com.rey.material.widget

Interface CheckedTextView.OnCheckedChangeListener

  • Enclosing class:
    CheckedTextView

    public static interface CheckedTextView.OnCheckedChangeListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the checked state is changed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCheckedChanged(CheckedTextView view, boolean checked)
      Called when the checked state is changed.

    • Method Detail

      • onCheckedChanged

        void onCheckedChanged(CheckedTextView view,
                    boolean checked)
        Called when the checked state is changed.
        Parameters:
        view - The CheckedTextView view.
        checked - The checked state.
